tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE recommendations (
    recommendation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    recommendation_text TEXT,
    organization_name TEXT,
    country TEXT,
    compliance_level INT
)
CREATE TABLE Recommendations ( recommendation_id INT PRIMARY KEY, recommendation_text TEXT, implementation_status VARCHAR(50) )
CREATE TABLE ComplianceLevels ( level_id INT PRIMARY KEY, compliance_level VARCHAR(50), date_assessed DATE )
